main event: Observers watched a semi-circle glow like a flare travel diagonally toward the sky until it was out of sight.
interesting points: The object was described as being larger than any falling star they had seen,No sound was heard during the observation,The object appeared to be a round or oval-shaped, silvery in color, and bright,The object's motion was steady and continuous at a seemingly tremendous speed,The report includes a request for additional information and follow-up from observers.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. [REDACTED] and their 3 children who were present during the sighting.
